question_text: How would you design an event-driven architecture on Google Cloud for real-time customer behavior analytics, integrating Generative AI for personalized recommendations?
hook_text: Unlock instant customer insights with GenAI. Here's how to build a real-time event-driven analytics system on Google Cloud.
cta_text: Master real-time analytics! Save this for your next Cloud Architect challenge.

answer_sections.title: Ingest Events with Pub/Sub
answer_sections.text: Capture real-time user events via Pub/Sub for scalable, reliable ingestion.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: First, we leverage Google Cloud Pub/Sub to efficiently capture vast streams of real-time user interaction events. Its global scale ensures reliable and low-latency data ingestion.

answer_sections.title: Process and Enrich with Dataflow, GenAI
answer_sections.text: Dataflow processes events, enriches them, and triggers GenAI for insights.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Google Cloud Dataflow then processes these events, performs transformations, and enriches them. Critically, it orchestrates calls to Vertex AI's Generative AI models for real-time insights and feature extraction.

answer_sections.title: Real-time Personalization with BigQuery, Looker
answer_sections.text: Deliver personalized recommendations and dashboards using BigQuery and Looker.
answer_sections.spoken_audio: Finally, processed data flows into BigQuery for analytics and immediate personalized recommendations. Looker provides real-time dashboards for continuous monitoring and actionable business intelligence from the enriched data.
